description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; woman in upper right corner looking out from an opening in a black wall toward a standing figure facing her on the left side of the image; in the upper left corner is a small black figure standing on an incline reaching toward a circular object just out of reach in front of them
portfolio: From Plate 3 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Third Scene, Plate 3 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
